title: List of unicorn startup companies
text:
This is a list of unicorn startup companies. In <a href="finance">finance</a>, a <a href="Unicorn%20%28finance%29">unicorn</a> is a <a href="Privately%20held%20company">privately held</a> <a href="startup%20company">startup company</a> with a current <a href="Valuation%20%28finance%29">valuation</a> of <a href="United%20States%20dollar">US$</a>1 billion or more, across <a href="list%20of%20technology%20centers">technology centers</a> throughout the world.
Notable lists of unicorn companies are maintained by "<a href="The%20Wall%20Street%20Journal">The Wall Street Journal</a>", "<a href="Fortune%20%28magazine%29">Fortune Magazine</a>", <a href="CNNMoney">CNNMoney</a>/<a href="CB%20Insights">CB Insights</a>, <a href="TechCrunch">TechCrunch</a>, <a href="PitchBook%20Data">PitchBook</a>/Morningstar, and <a href="Tech%20in%20Asia">Tech in Asia</a>.
List.
Unicorns are concentrated in a few countries/regions: <a href="China">China</a> (301),<a href="US">US</a> (460), <a href="India">India</a> (85), <a href="Israel">Israel</a> (30), <a href="France">France</a> (24), <a href="UK">UK</a> (22), <a href="Canada">Canada</a> (17), <a href="Germany">Germany</a> (16), <a href="South%20Korea">South Korea</a> (13), <a href="Brazil">Brazil</a> (12), <a href="Singapore">Singapore</a> (10), <a href="Hong%20Kong">Hong Kong</a> (8), <a href="Mexico">Mexico</a> (7), <a href="Australia">Australia</a> (7), <a href="Japan">Japan</a> (7), <a href="Indonesia">Indonesia</a> (6), <a href="Sweden">Sweden</a> (6), <a href="Portugal">Portugal</a> (5), <a href="Switzerland">Switzerland</a> (5), <a href="Argentina">Argentina</a> (3), <a href="Ireland">Ireland</a> (3), <a href="Netherlands">Netherlands</a> (3), <a href="Nigeria">Nigeria</a> (3), <a href="Spain">Spain</a> (3), <a href="Turkey">Turkey</a> (3), <a href="Thailand">Thailand</a> (3), <a href="Austria">Austria</a> (2), <a href="Belgium">Belgium</a> (3), <a href="Denmark">Denmark</a> (2), <a href="Estonia">Estonia</a> (2), <a href="Norway">Norway</a> (2), <a href="Philippines">Philippines</a> (2), <a href="UAE">UAE</a> (2) and ten other countries (1 each).
Former unicorns.
These companies were formerly unicorns, but exited the list due to <a href="Initial%20public%20offering">IPO</a> or <a href="Mergers%20and%20acquisitions">acquisitions</a>: United States (81), China (42), India (12), Canada (4), United Kingdom (4), South Korea (3), Sweden (3)
